title: Crazy Smoker
text:
The "BHAI Group" Of IIIT Allahabad is Famous For Many Things, Leading in Every Field Of College ActivitySo One Day TheLeader Of Bhai Groupdecided to smokeC(N)cigarettes each day:F(N) = 34N+ (30 × N) + 32C(N) = F(N) mod 11, wherex mod yis theremainder obtained by dividing x by y.ButBhai Group's Leader's Girlfriendwants that he doesn't smoke any cigarettes, so she made a modification:F(N) = 34N+ (30 × N) + (32 + M)C(N) = F(N) mod 11InputFirst line of each test case is an integerT, total number of test cases. NextTlines contains a single integerN.OutputPrint theminimumvalue ofMin single line for each test case.Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 1061 ≤ N ≤ 1018ExampleInput:2
1
2Output:3
6ExplanationFor N = 1, F(N) = 34 + 30 + 32 = 96. So, M = 3, now C(N) = 99 mod11 = 0.For N = 2, F(N) = 1156 + 60 + 32 = 1248. So, M = 6, now C(N) = 1254 mod11 = 0Problem Credits : IIIT Allahabad HE Club
